mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, mobile, password, nickname, last_login_ip, last_login_date, status, last_login_device, company_id, parent_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, name, card_no, email,country_code
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.create_date as registerDate, a.mobile, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as attachmentId1Link, c.id as carId,c.name as carName,c.code as code from t_user a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id left join t_car c on a.id =c.driver_id
where a.parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_transporter (id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, mobile, password, nickname, last_login_ip, last_login_date, status, last_login_device, company_id, parent_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, name, card_no, email,country_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lastLoginDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
